page.title: 10Family Life
page.content: On Saturday I got up at 9:20 a.m.,got dressed and went downstairs.My mum was baking as usual so she didn't stop to talk.My dad was cursing the dogs because they were jumping at the door.Tom was in the sitting room watching television so I went in and joined him. At 1:00 p.m. we all went up to my grandma's for dinner. At 2:30 p.m.Tom went to Tom Baddeley's party and Mum,dad and I went to Hodges and Moss to buy blight spray.When we arrived home I played on the computer. At 5:00 p.m. mum called me for tea and after tea we all collected Tom from the birthday party and visited our friends. At 9:00 p.m.we had some toast and watched television.Later we moved the irrigation and then we went to bed.
